Dashboard.Name: Name of the visualization
Dashboard.Type: LineChart | BarChart | StackedBarChart | PieChart | DonutChart | ScatterPlot | Histogram |
Dashboard.Labels: Labels for the data (used in Pie and Donut charts)
Dashboard.Values: Values for the data (used in Pie and Donut charts)
Dashboard.Categories: Categories for the data (used in Categorical charts like Bar and Stacked Bar charts)
